condition.narrative: Notwithstanding the foregoing, in the event of any inconsistency between the provisions of the Cash Transfer and Funds TransferManual, and those of this Agreement, the provisions of this Agreement shall prevail.

Per ESCP the Recipient shall provide training to vaccination teams on good waste collection and transport practices, and the firsttraining will be done not later than two months after effectiveness and throughout the duration of the project on a need base.
Per ESCP the security force training plan prepared, adopted not later than two months of the effective date.

The Recipient shall by no later than thirty (30) days (1) month, after the Effective Date, update the Project implementationmanual for the Original Project (as so updated, “Project Implementation Manual”) containing detailed guidelines and procedures forthe implementation of the Project, including with respect to: (i) implementation arrangements; (ii) administrative aspects; (iii)procurement; (iv) implementation of environmental and social instruments as defined in the ESCP; (v) financial management andaccounting; (vi) monitoring and evaluation; ; (viii) personal data collection and processing in accordance with good internationalpractice; and (xiii) such other technical, administrative, fiduciary or coordination arrangements as may be necessary to ensureeffective Project implementation.

The Recipient shall not later than two (2) months after the Effective Date, upgrade, customize and thereafter maintain throughoutthe Project implementation period, an accounting software for the Project acceptable to the Association.

The Recipient shall, not later than two (2) months after the Effective Date enter into an agreement with the Office of the GeneralAuditor in form and substance satisfactory to the Association for the purposes of carrying out financial audits of the Project.

The Recipient shall, not later than two (2) months after the Effective Date prepare, in accordance with terms of referenceacceptable to the Association, and furnish to the Association an implementation manual for the Project, in form and substanceacceptable to the Association, containing, inter alia, detailed arrangements and procedures for: (i) implementation arrangements;(ii) administrative aspects; (iii) procurement; (iv) implementation of environmental and social instruments as defined in the ESCP;(v) financial management and accounting; (vi) monitoring and evaluation; (vii) conditions, criteria and procedures to be appliedfor the provision of Hazard Pays; (viii) personal data collection and processing in accordance with good international practice;and (ix) such other technical, administrative, fiduciary or coordination arrangements as may be necessary to ensure effectiveProject implementation.
